metadata.title: AI Image Studio - Nano Banana Studio
metadata.description: Full-featured AI image generator and editor. Create stunning images from text or transform existing photos with natural language.

title: AI Image Studio
description: Create and edit images with the power of AI

tutorial.title: How to Use
tutorial.subtitle: Master AI image generation with these professional tips

step1.title: Choose Your Mode
step1.description: Select 'Text to Image' to create from scratch, or 'Edit & Merge' to transform existing photos or combine multiple images.

step2.title: Write Your Prompt
step2.description: Describe what you want in natural language. Be specific about subject, style, lighting, and composition. No need for keyword spam like '4k, masterpiece'.

step3.title: Generate & Iterate
step3.description: Click generate and review the result. If it's 80% correct, edit conversationally instead of starting over. Iteration is key to professional results.

text_to_image.title: Text to Image
text_to_image.description: Create images from text descriptions. Nano Banana Pro uses 'Deep Think' reasoning to understand your intent, physics, and composition. Perfect for generating art, product mockups, and creative visuals.

edit_merge.title: Edit & Merge
edit_merge.description: Edit single images or merge up to 14 photos into one cohesive scene. Supports in-painting (add/remove objects), style swapping, colorization, and restoration. Great for brand consistency and character sheets.

tip1.title: Use the Framework
tip1.description: Structure your prompt: [Subject + Adjectives] doing [Action] in [Location]. [Composition]. [Lighting]. [Style].
tip1.example: A stoic robot barista with glowing blue optics serving coffee in a futuristic cafe. Wide shot. Warm morning light. Cinematic style.

tip2.title: Specify Lighting & Time
tip2.description: Lighting dictates mood. 'Candle light' feels intimate, 'hospital fluorescent' feels clinical. Always set the time of day.
tip2.example: Portrait of a musician in a jazz club. Dramatic spotlight from above. Midnight atmosphere with smoky haze.

tip3.title: Be Specific with Text
tip3.description: Don't just say 'add text'. Specify the exact words, font style, color, and placement for accurate text rendering.
tip3.example: A vintage poster with the text 'JAZZ NIGHT' in bold red serif font at the top center.

q1.question: What's the difference between Nano Banana and Nano Banana Pro?
q1.answer: Nano Banana is faster and supports single image editing. Nano Banana Pro has 'Deep Think' reasoning, supports up to 14 reference images, renders perfect text, and can generate factual diagrams.

q2.question: How many images can I merge at once?
q2.answer: With Nano Banana Pro, you can upload up to 14 reference images and merge them into one cohesive scene while maintaining character consistency for up to 5 people.

q3.question: How many credits does it cost?
q3.answer: Text-to-Image costs 2 credits per generation. Edit & Merge costs 4 credits per generation. Free tier includes 5 credits per month.

q4.question: Can the AI render text accurately?
q4.answer: Yes! Nano Banana Pro excels at rendering legible, correctly spelled text. For best results, specify the exact text, font style, color, and placement in your prompt.
